title: Jesus the Bridegroom: The Greatest Love Story Ever Told (e-book)

About the Author

Brant Pitre is a professor of sacred Scripture at Notre Dame Seminary in New Orleans, Louisiana, and the bestselling author of Jesus, the Tribulation, and the End of Exile and Jesus and the Jewish Roots of the Eucharist. He lives in Louisiana.
